note.p: Education: Eton; Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1849), MA (1852)

Career: Assistant, Department of Antiquities, British Museum (1851); Keeper, Department of British and Mediaeval Antiquities, and of the Ethnographical Collections, British Museum; Trustee and Keeper of the Christy Collection; Director, Society of Antiquaries of London; gave his collection of eastern ceramics to the British Museum
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1897 vol 61 pp x-xii signed by J E
